pages.text: To use, place a $(item)Carcass$() on the top and $(use) with a $(item)Hunter's Knife$() or a $(item)Butcher's Knife$().$(p)$(info) Using a $(item)Hunter's Knife$() on a $(item)Butcher's Block$() has a chance to increase the yield when harvesting $(thing)Pelts$().$(p)$(info) Using a $(item)Butcher's Knife$() on a $(item)Butcher's Block$() has a chance to increase the yield when harvesting $(thing)Meats$().
$(warning) Using may cause hunger. If it isn't working, you might be too hungry.
